cards.description:
fishing:Quest: Play a Common, Uncommon, and Rare card in a turn.
Reward: Shuffle The Gem Search into your draw pile.

cards.name: The Prismatic Portal+
cards.description:
fishing:Quest: Play a Common, Uncommon, and Rare card in a turn.
Reward: Shuffle The Gem Search into your draw pile.

cards.name: Three of a Kind
cards.description:
Choose a card in your draw pile.
Shuffle 2 fishing:Foil copies into your draw pile.
Exhaust.

cards.name: Vexing Deal
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and Exhaust 1 card.
If it's Ascension 10 or higher, gain 1 Strength.

cards.name: Vexing Deal+
cards.description:
At the start of your turn, draw 1 card and Exhaust 1 card.
If it's Ascension 10 or higher, gain 1 Strength.

relics.name: The Rod
relics.description: Upgrade the first 3 unupgraded fishing:Foil cards you draw each combat.
relics.flavorText: The only one of its kind.

relics.name: Unagee Skull
relics.description: At the start of each combat, shuffle 1 fishing:Fish into your draw and discard piles.
relics.flavorText: Known to guard sunken ships long ago.

relics.name: Goggles
relics.description: Whenever you end your turn with an empty hand, gain 1 Strength.
relics.flavorText: "With these... we can cross it." - Kublai the Great

relics.name: Signpost
relics.description: The first time you play a Power card each combat, gain 7 Block.

relics.name: Bobber
relics.description: Every time you play 3 fishing:Fish in a single turn, deal 7 damage to ALL enemies.

relics.name: Lucky Ring
relics.description: At the start of your 2nd turn, draw 1 card and gain [E] [E] .
relics.flavorText: The eye blinks just when you start to look away.

relics.name: Newsletter
relics.description: The merchant's cards are fishing:Foil, Upgraded, and cost 20% less.
relics.flavorText: "Peculiar! A shimmering cube of false promises." - Ranwid

relics.name: Broken Oar
relics.description:
Gain [E] at the start of your turn.
Draw 1 fewer card each turn.
relics.flavorText: Most trips to the Spire are one-way.

relics.name: Maelstrom Ankh
relics.description: You no longer find Boots, Guppies, or Piranhas.

relics.name: Rainbow Rod
relics.description:
Replaces The Rod.
Upgrade the first 2 unupgraded cards you draw each turn.

relics.name: Booster Box
relics.description:
Upon pickup, Upgrade 2 random non-Foil cards and make them fishing:Foil.
In addition, obtain a fishing:Foil Promo card.
relics.flavorText: More than six promotional Foils! Can you discover them all?

potions.name: Starlight Soda
potions.description: Remove your Weak, Vulnerable, and Frail. Scry 3.

potions.name: Care Package
potions.description: Add Smite, Safety and a Shiv to your hand. Heal 6 HP.

keywords.name: Fish
keywords.description: Fish are Colorless 0 cost cards that confer a bonus effect, draw a card, and Exhaust.

keywords.name: Foil
keywords.description:
In each card reward, 1 of the cards will be Foil.
Shiny!

keywords.name: Quest
keywords.description:
When you complete a Quest, obtain its associated Reward.
If you already have that Quest in progress, draw 1 card instead.

keywords.name: Solo
keywords.description: Effect triggers only if there are no other cards in your hand.

keywords.name: Unnate
keywords.description: Starts each combat at the bottom of your draw pile.

keywords.name: Voyaged
keywords.description: Effect triggers only if you drew this card during your turn, outside of the opening draw.
